description:
Hello fashion lover, are you ready to become a real princess? With ‘Princess Dress Up’, you can design incredible looks and outfits that will make your princess stand out at every moment. Enjoy a wide collection of elegant dresses, accessories and unique hairstyles. Let your creativity run and make sure you're the best stylist and that your princess always looks fashionable! 

Featured Features:
-Numerous combinations of looks: design and combine dresses, hairstyles and accessories to create the princess of your dreams. The options are endless!
-Photo Mode: Capture your creations with our photo mode and save your favourite looks to share with friends and family.
-Designed for fashion lovers of all ages: whether you're a skilled fashion stylist or just a fashion enthusiast, this girl dress up game is made for you.
-Customize hairstyles and accessories: change your doll's hairstyle and hair colour and add sparkling accessories to make her shine at any event.

Don't wait any longer! With 'Princess Dress Up', your creativity knows no limits. Embark on this fashion adventure and become the stylist you've always dreamed of.
name: Princess Dress Up
